description: This restaurant features sophisticated, creative cooking and top quality ingredients, without forgetting the culinary traditions of the area and region. Therefore, don't be surprised by the special attention reserved for rice: the menu offers a selection of twenty risottos, but also a lot of delicious land and sea specialities.
